special_text:
Whenever you cast a spell from exile, create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token.
[+1]: Add {R}{R}. Spend this mana only to pay suspend costs or activate abilities.
[-X]: Look at the top X cards of your library. Exile one of them and put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Put a number of time counters on the exiled cards equal to its mana value. If it doesn’t have suspend, it gains suspend.
